abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Casa Adela in Manhattan's East Village, where owner Adela Ferguson has been serving up authentic Puerto Rican cuisine since 1976.
lead_paragraph: Adela Ferguson’s restaurant has been serving authentic Puerto Rican food in Alphabet City since the neighborhood was known as Loisaida.

headline.main: Casa Adela in East Village Is the Home of the Magical Rotisserie Chicken
headline.print_headline: Chicken Like Abuela Used to Make

snippet: Adela Ferguson’s restaurant has been serving authentic Puerto Rican food in Alphabet City since the neighborhood was known as Loisaida.
